Articles.Content: I think telescopes would be a great addition to the game because if you have a spacecraft that has a telescope on it you can see distant body's without having to go to them. It would be great to create something like the James Webb telescope and actually be able to use it as a telescope
It's interesting. Definitely it'd be useful as a way to introduce hidden/new planets to map view so maybe something of this ilk will show up with interstellar.
